Class OpenSimplexNoise

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raylabz.opensimplex.OpenSimplexNoise

  • public class OpenSimplexNoise
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenSimplexNoise()
      Constructors a noise generator from the default seed (0).
      OpenSimplexNoise(long seed)
      Initializes the class using a permutation array generated from a 64-bit seed.
      OpenSimplexNoise(short[] perm)
      Constructors a noise generator from a given permutation array.
